input.sentences: there was a community event at the public park recently | aimed at teaching young kids fire safety .
here | a volunteer shows the kids how a proper fire pit is set up .
when the fire was lit and started billowing lots of smoke | that really got the point across for the kids .
later | kids gathered around the craft table to get supplies .
the kids also got to make ceramic hand-prints that were hardened in the fire .
output.sentences: Besty recently began teaching kids about fire safety.
She made the mistake of getting a volunteer the set a proper example.
Without getting into the details I will only say the volunteer did it wrong and there was lots of smoke before the fire had even started.
The kids ran to the tables to look for supplies to put out the fire.

The newspaper wrote about the event (leaving out  the volunteer) and titled it "Fire Safety Instructor Starts Unsafe Fire", which sold them some extra prints at Betsy's expense so the experience has hardened her a bit but she says she won't give up on the kids.
